name: Thirsty roots
description:
Thirsty Roots is a game for two players. Put your clicking skills to the test as you race your sapling's root against your friend's sapling's root to reach the underground water source. Grow your roots to victory! 

Player One uses either the S key or the left side of the screen on mobile, while Player Two uses the down arrow key or the right side of the screen. Who will emerge as the champion in this race of Thirsty roots?
